name: "it's" Hiding in a House
description:
A game made for Trijam #129 with the theme "You have to look for it!"

In this puzzle game you have to use the clues provided to guess where "it" ends up at 6:00, you can interact with the map to help "take notes" on where "it" could be at any given moment.

I have only made physics based platformers up to this point, so this game was  definitely out of my comfort zone. Glad I was able to try out the idea in 3 hours though!
